program.name: Ontspannen
program.description: Relaxation techniques and stress relief exercises
program.targetAudience: Individuals seeking stress relief and relaxation techniques
learningObjectives: Understand the scientific necessity of stress and recognize personal warning signals
Learn to categorize stress and choose effective relaxation methods
Practice calming and cognitive exercises and assess their effectiveness
Consolidate learned lessons and automate relaxation routines
